verses.verse: And the LORD<WH3068> spoke<WH1696> to Moses,<WH4872> saying,<WH559>

Command<WH6680> the children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> that they put<WH7971> out of the camp<WH4264> every<WH3605> leper,<WH6879> and every<WH3605> one that has an issue,<WH2100> and whoever<WH3605> is defiled<WH2931> by the dead:<WH5315>

Both male<WH2145> and female<WH5347> shall you put<WH7971> out, without<WH2351> the camp<WH4264> shall you put<WH7971> them; that they defile<WH2930> not their camps,<WH4264> in the middle<WH8432> whereof<WH834> I dwell.<WH7931>

And the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> did<WH6213> so,<WH3651> and put<WH7971> them out without<WH2351> the camp:<WH4264> as the LORD<WH3068> spoke<WH1696> to Moses,<WH4872> so<WH3651> did<WH6213> the children<WH1121> of Israel.<WH3478>
And the LORD<WH3068> spoke<WH1696> to Moses,<WH4872> saying,<WH559>

Speak<WH1696> to the children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> When<WH3588> a man<WH376> or<WH176> woman<WH802> shall commit<WH6213> any<WH3605> sin<WH2403> that men<WH120> commit, to do<WH6213> a trespass<WH4604> against the LORD,<WH3068> and that person<WH5315> be guilty;<WH816>

Then they shall confess<WH3034> their sin<WH2403> which<WH834> they have done:<WH6213> and he shall recompense<WH7725> his trespass<WH817> with the principal<WH7218> thereof, and add<WH3254> to it the fifth<WH2549> part thereof, and give<WH5414> it to him against whom<WH834> he has trespassed.<WH816>

But if<WH518> the man<WH376> have no<WH369> kinsman<WH1350> to recompense<WH7725> the trespass<WH817> to, let the trespass<WH817> be recompensed<WH7725> to the LORD,<WH3068> even to the priest;<WH3548> beside<WH905> the ram<WH352> of the atonement,<WH3725> whereby<WH834> an atonement<WH3722> shall be made for him.
And every<WH3605> offering<WH8641> of all<WH3605> the holy<WH6944> things of the children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> which<WH834> they bring<WH7126> to the priest,<WH3548> shall be his.
And every man's<WH376> hallowed<WH6944> things shall be his: whatever<WH834> any man<WH376> gives<WH5414> the priest,<WH3548> it shall be his.
And the LORD<WH3068> spoke<WH1696> to Moses,<WH4872> saying,<WH559>

Speak<WH1696> to the children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> and say<WH559> to them, If<WH3588> any<WH376> man's<WH376> wife<WH802> go<WH7847> aside,<WH7847> and commit<WH4603> a trespass<WH4604> against him,

And a man<WH376> lie<WH7901> with her carnally,<WH7902> <WH2233> and it be hid<WH5956> from the eyes<WH5869> of her husband,<WH376> and be kept<WH5641> close,<WH5641> and she be defiled,<WH2930> and there be no<WH369> witness<WH5707> against her, neither<WH3808> she be taken<WH8610> with the manner;

And the spirit<WH7307> of jealousy<WH7068> come<WH5674> on him, and he be jealous<WH7065> of his wife,<WH802> and she be defiled:<WH2930> or<WH176> if the spirit<WH7307> of jealousy<WH7068> come<WH5674> on him, and he be jealous<WH7065> of his wife,<WH802> and she be not defiled:<WH2930>

Then shall the man<WH376> bring<WH935> his wife<WH802> to the priest,<WH3548> and he shall bring<WH935> her offering<WH7133> for her, the tenth<WH6224> part of an ephah<WH374> of barley<WH8184> meal;<WH7058> he shall pour<WH3332> no<WH3808> oil<WH8081> on it, nor<WH3808> put<WH5414> frankincense<WH3828> thereon;<WH5921> for it is an offering<WH4503> of jealousy,<WH7068> an offering<WH4503> of memorial,<WH2146> bringing<WH2142> iniquity<WH5771> to remembrance.<WH2142>
And the priest<WH3548> shall bring<WH7126> her near,<WH7138> and set<WH5975> her before<WH6440> the LORD:<WH3068>

And the priest<WH3548> shall take<WH3947> holy<WH6918> water<WH4325> in an earthen<WH2789> vessel;<WH3627> and of the dust<WH6083> that is in the floor<WH7172> of the tabernacle<WH4908> the priest<WH3548> shall take,<WH3947> and put<WH5414> it into<WH413> the water:<WH4325>

And the priest<WH3548> shall set<WH5975> the woman<WH802> before<WH6440> the LORD,<WH3068> and uncover<WH6544> the woman's<WH802> head,<WH7218> and put<WH5414> the offering<WH4503> of memorial<WH2146> in her hands,<WH3709> which<WH1931> is the jealousy<WH7068> offering:<WH4503> and the priest<WH3548> shall have<WH1961> in his hand<WH3027> the bitter<WH4751> water<WH4325> that causes the curse:<WH779>

And the priest<WH3548> shall charge<WH7650> her by an oath,<WH7650> and say<WH559> to the woman,<WH802> If<WH518> no<WH3808> man<WH376> have lain<WH7901> with you, and if<WH518> you have not gone<WH7847> aside<WH7847> to uncleanness<WH2932> with another instead<WH8478> of your husband,<WH376> be you free<WH5352> from this bitter<WH4751> water<WH4325> that causes the curse:<WH779>

But if<WH3588> you have gone<WH7847> aside<WH7847> to another instead<WH8478> of your husband,<WH376> and if<WH3588> you be defiled,<WH2930> and some man<WH376> have lain<WH5414> <WH7903> with you beside<WH1107> your husband:<WH376>

Then the priest<WH3548> shall charge<WH7650> the woman<WH802> with an oath<WH7621> of cursing,<WH423> and the priest<WH3548> shall say<WH559> to the woman,<WH802> The LORD<WH3068> make<WH5414> you a curse<WH423> and an oath<WH7621> among<WH8432> your people,<WH5971> when the LORD<WH3068> does make<WH5414> your thigh<WH3409> to rot,<WH5307> and your belly<WH990> to swell;<WH6639>

And this water<WH4325> that causes the curse<WH779> shall go<WH935> into your bowels,<WH4578> to make your belly<WH990> to swell,<WH6638> and your thigh<WH3409> to rot:<WH5307> And the woman<WH802> shall say,<WH559> Amen,<WH543> amen.<WH543>
And the priest<WH3548> shall write<WH3789> these<WH428> curses<WH423> in a book,<WH5612> and he shall blot<WH4229> them out with the bitter<WH4751> water:<WH4325>

And he shall cause the woman<WH802> to drink<WH8248> the bitter<WH4751> water<WH4325> that causes the curse:<WH779> and the water<WH4325> that causes the curse<WH779> shall enter<WH935> into her, and become bitter.<WH4751>

Then the priest<WH3548> shall take<WH3947> the jealousy<WH7068> offering<WH4503> out of the woman's<WH802> hand,<WH3027> and shall wave<WH5130> the offering<WH4503> before<WH6440> the LORD,<WH3068> and offer<WH7126> it on the altar:<WH4196>

And the priest<WH3548> shall take<WH7061> an handful<WH7061> of the offering,<WH4503> even the memorial<WH234> thereof, and burn<WH6999> it on the altar,<WH4196> and afterward<WH310> shall cause the woman<WH802> to drink<WH8248> the water.<WH4325>

And when he has made her to drink<WH8248> the water,<WH4325> then it shall come<WH1961> to pass, that, if<WH518> she be defiled,<WH2930> and have done trespass<WH4604> against her husband,<WH376> that the water<WH4325> that causes the curse<WH779> shall enter<WH935> into her, and become bitter,<WH4751> and her belly<WH990> shall swell,<WH6638> and her thigh<WH3409> shall rot:<WH5307> and the woman<WH802> shall be a curse<WH423> among<WH7130> her people.<WH5971>
And if<WH518> the woman<WH802> be not defiled,<WH2930> but be clean;<WH2889> then she shall be free,<WH5352> and shall conceive<WH2232> seed.<WH2233>
This<WH2063> is the law<WH8451> of jealousies,<WH7068> when<WH834> a wife<WH802> goes<WH7847> aside<WH7847> to another instead<WH8478> of her husband,<WH376> and is defiled;<WH2930>

Or<WH176> when<WH834> the spirit<WH7307> of jealousy<WH7068> comes<WH5674> on him, and he be jealous<WH7065> over his wife,<WH802> and shall set<WH5975> the woman<WH802> before<WH6440> the LORD,<WH3068> and the priest<WH3548> shall execute<WH6213> on her all<WH3605> this<WH2063> law.<WH8451>
Then shall the man<WH376> be guiltless<WH5352> from iniquity,<WH5771> and this<WH1931> woman<WH802> shall bear<WH5375> her iniquity.<WH5771>
